content: i have wanted to make a pair of mitts using the hermione s everyday sock pattern for quite a while now this pattern uses dk yarn and makes a pair of warm and squishy mitts these fit up to a women s medium to make a smaller/larger pair i recommend going down/up either yarn and/or needle size i have knit this pattern a few times now but have not proofread the pattern please let me know if you find any mistakes or have any concerns
